https://tmrev.io/movie/2769-An American in Paris 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lyDXkvG53ldz6Cf7dbjJl7TaoP5.jpg Jerry Mulligan is an exuberant American expatriate in Paris trying to make a reputation as a painter. His friend Adam is a struggling concert pianist who's a long time associate of a famous French singer, Henri Baurel. A lonely society woman, Milo Roberts, takes Jerry under her wing and supports him, but is interested in more than his art. An American in Paris
